Starting with NPM

  • Disabled

How to install npm modules:

  1. Create package.json (npm init -y)
  2. Install a package using the name of the package (npm install *package-name*)
  3. Adding bootstrap: npm i bootstrap
  4. Optional: Add scripts in package.json
    Example: "live": "live-server index.html"
  5. The scripts can now be used as commands in the terminal
    To start live-server type: npm run live
  6. Install parcel bundler: npm install parcel.bundler
  7. Add another script to package.json
    "parcel": "parcel index.html"
